name: Code Lyoko
description:
A Universal Game of Friendship

Earth has a parallel universe called Lyoko and both face the threat of annihilation! A super virus, X.A.N.A., has infected the central processing units of the Super Computer. Only four kids know of the existence of Lyoko and can foil the mad computerâ€™s evil designs and save the earth. Meet Yumi, Ulrich, Odd and Jeremy, ordinary boarding school students who lead double lives in the digital world of Lyoko.
Players can take on the roles of the four characters Odd, Yumi, Ulrich and Jeremy, helping our heroes save planet Earth and the parallel universe Lyoko from total destruction!
